name: Boba Fett, Prepared Hunter
Lore: 'Bounty hunter. Assassin. Boba Fett''s Mandalorian armor was so versatile that his opponents never knew what to expect.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. May be revealed from hand to take Slave 1 from Reserve Deck; reshuffle;  and deploy both simultaneously. While piloting Slave 1, it is maneuver +3 and hyperspeed + 1. Draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise (if present at a site may add a destiny to total power instead).',
